== About Me ==

I've been using Ubuntu since about 2005, and had previously used Mandrake (aka Mandriva) and then RedHat/Fedora, as well as spending a year working with Solaris in a Telecomms Environment.
I'm a MEng student of Electronics & Software Engineering at Queen's University Belfast.
Usually Located in Belfast, UK (UTC).
Have worked in a software development/automated testing environment while working for Ericsson LMI, working within Cellular Management.
